forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning with thunderstorms developing for the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning with thunderstorms developing for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 50F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Low around 5C. WSW winds shifting to ENE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Low near 40F. WSW winds shifting to ENE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.
